AerCap’s Transition to New Technology
2006 –2013: Orders for the Boeing 787 aircraft, 
Airbus A350 aircraft, Airbus A320neo Family 
aircraft and Embraer E -Jets E2
2014: Acquired ILFC from AIG, purchasing a fleet 
of >900 owned aircraft and an order book of >300 aircraft at a discount to book value
2015 -2020: Aircraft orders with the OEMs for the 
Boeing 737MAX, Boeing 787, Airbus A330neo 
and Airbus A320neo Family
2021: Acquired GECAS from GE at a discount to 
book value, purchasing a fleet of ~820 aircraft 
and an order book of exclusively new technology aircraft 
Today: Order book of >430 new technology 
aircraft will form the backbone of our future
